channel.title: Projects on Pankaja Ambalgi
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Pankaja Ambalgi

item.title: GenAI 2: Q and A GenAI application
item.description: Developed an end-to-end Generative AI application to answer questions from the personal pdf documents that has been provided as an input to the LLM models. I utilized the AWS Bedrock service to fine tune the LLM models.

item.title: GenAI 1: Blog Generation using AWS Bedrock
item.description: I developed a simple end-to-end Generative AI project to create a 100-word blog. I utilized the AWS Bedrock service, specifically leveraging the Llama2 LLM model for blog generation. A Lambda function was created to take advantage of serverless architecture, and an API Gateway was used to trigger POST requests to this function. The generated blog content is then saved in an AWS S3 bucket. Link to Git hub repository

item.title: DS 1: House Prices - Advanced Regression Techniques
item.description: Developed a Jupyter Notebook to predict the housing prices using advanced regression technique. Handled the missing data, preprocessing. Modeling. Hypermater tuning. Link to Git hub repository
